description: Removes session information for a specified bot, alias, and user ID. You can use this operation to restart a conversation with a bot. When you remove a session, the entire history of the session is removed so that you can start again. You don't need to delete a session. Sessions have a time limit and will expire. Set the session time limit when you create the bot. The default is 5 minutes, but you can specify anything between 1 minute and 24 hours. If you specify a bot or alias ID that doesn't exist, you receive a BadRequestException. If the locale doesn't exist in the bot, or if the locale hasn't been enables for the alias, you receive a BadRequestException.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot that contains the session data.

parameters.name: botAliasId
parameters.description: The alias identifier in use for the bot that contains the session data.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The locale where the session is in use.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The identifier of the session to delete.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot that contained the session data.

nested_items.name: botAliasId
nested_items.description: The alias identifier in use for the bot that contained the session data.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The locale where the session was used.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the deleted session.
